page.title: 19Trade and Attitude
page.content: In a shopping survey carried out in the area it was found that 86% of shoppers used the local shops for the purchase of up to 5 items of shopping (food and household goods) but only 28% used local shops for a large monthly shopping trip. In a survey of quality of enviroment only 32% of the people asked (a sample of 150)were happy with facilities in the area.the 3 most popular facilities that people would like to see in the area were 1.better quality housing. 2.greater play facilities for children. 3.more shops in some parts of the area.
